To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MoneyFlowIndex _mfi;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_mfi = MFI(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_mfi.IsReady)
{
    var positiveMoneyFlow = _mfi.PositiveMoneyFlow.Value;
    var negativeMoneyFlow = _mfi.NegativeMoneyFlow.Value;
    var previousTypicalPrice = _mfi.PreviousTypicalPrice.Value;
    var current = _mfi.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.mfi = self.MFI(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.mfi.IsReady:
    positive_money_flow = self.mfi.PositiveMoneyFlow.Value
    negative_money_flow = self.mfi.NegativeMoneyFlow.Value
    previous_typical_price = self.mfi.PreviousTypicalPrice.Value
    current = self.mfi.Current.Value
